department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Goods and services for the provision of packaging materials for utilization by the government of Canada according to the provided agreement. Such operational resources are for the utilization in a public setting.
full_summary:
**Request for Standing Offer (RSO) - Packaging Materials**

## Background

To provide strategic sourcing solutions for its clients, the [Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/) invites interested parties to submit proposals for a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for packaging materials.

## Scope of Work

The Government of Canada aims to establish up to six (6) National Masters Standing Offers (NMSO) for the supply of packaging materials, steel cans, steel drums, and collapsible skip box containers. These offers will be used by authorized users across Canada.

## Key Information

* **Reference Number:** WS4220318148-Doc4300246367
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** 2024-03-12
* **Tender Closing Date:** See amended deadline: 2024-04-23 at 14:00 EST (amended from 2024-04-17)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date:** N/A
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** This procurement is subject to the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others as listed in the trade agreements section.

## Contact Information

For any queries or concerns regarding this RSO, please contact:
Raphael Lafontaine
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
[raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
